short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: incredibox-sprunki is a game of the Incredibox Sprunki genre.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your browser into a music creation studio with Incredibox Sprunki! This extension brings the unique Sprunki beatboxing experience to Chrome, allowing you to:

Create and mix original beats using the signature Sprunki sound palette
Layer multiple audio tracks with an intuitive drag-and-drop interface
Access a carefully curated collection of Sprunki-themed vocal samples and beats
Save and share your musical creations directly from your browser
Experience the full Incredibox rhythm-making magic with zero latency

Perfect for music enthusiasts, beatboxers, and anyone who wants to create amazing beats on the go. No musical experience required - just drag, drop, and let the rhythm flow!
Note: This extension complements the official Incredibox experience and is designed for Sprunki-style music creation
